Package com.how_hard_can_it_be.hex

Class Summary
GridColoringMouseListener Listens to mouse clicks and tells HexCanvas to repaint one or more of its hexes.
HexCanvas A hex-based canvas on which to draw, like hex paper.
HexPoint Designates a single hex in a HexCanvas, as follows: x is the column offset from the leftmost column of hexes
y is the hex offset from the topmost hex in the column designated by x.
Zoomer Sets zoom factor on HexCanvas.
